mrt.title: MRT Stations of Singapore
mrt.instructions: Unmix and unscramble the letters to form the names of MRT stations.

countries.title: Countries of the World
countries.instructions: Unmix and unscramble the letters to form the names of countries.

mrt-hard.title: MRT Stations of Singapore (Hard)
mrt-hard.instructions: Unmix and unscramble the letters to form the names of LRT and future MRT stations.

fruit-veg.title: Fruits and Vegetables
fruit-veg.instructions: Unmix and unscramble the letters to form the names of fruits and vegetables.
